lyrics.lyric: お決まりの今日が 退屈な日々が
lyrics.translation: 一如往常的今日 依旧如此索然无味
lyrics.romanization: o ki ma ri no kyo u ga ta i ku tsu na hi bi ga

lyrics.lyric: 変わり始めた ある日の物語
lyrics.translation: 可也了发生转变 化作某一天的故事
lyrics.romanization: ka wa ri ha ji me ta a ru hi no mo no ga ta ri

lyrics.lyric: ここからきっと これまでのどんな私よりずっと
lyrics.translation: 自此起始 我定会超越过去往昔
lyrics.romanization: ko ko ka ra ki tto ko re ma de no do n na wa ta shi yo ri zu tto

lyrics.lyric: 私になる new me
lyrics.translation: 成为全新的自己 New me
lyrics.romanization: wa ta shi ni na ru new me

lyrics.lyric: どんどん上手になっていく smile
lyrics.translation: 愈发擅长的笑颜
lyrics.romanization: do n do n jo u zu ni na tte i ku smile

lyrics.lyric: いつも愛想良く day by day 擦り減らした
lyrics.translation: 总是那么亲切和善 日复一日也褪去了真实
lyrics.romanization: i tsu mo a i so yo ku day by day su ri he ra shi ta

lyrics.lyric: 本当の自分なんて居ない
lyrics.translation: 真正的自我已不复存在
lyrics.romanization: ho n to u no ji bu n na n te i na i

lyrics.lyric: 嘯いた "I'm feeling good"
lyrics.translation: 若无其事地说着 "我感觉很好"
lyrics.romanization: u so bu i ta "I'm feeling good"

lyrics.lyric: 嘘付きな "I'm feeling you"
lyrics.translation: 而你却谎说"我懂你的感受"
lyrics.romanization: u so tsu ki na "I'm feeling you"

lyrics.lyric: たまらないわ
lyrics.translation: 我实在难以承受
lyrics.romanization: ta ma ra na i wa

lyrics.lyric: Hey you 恋人は？
lyrics.translation: 嘿 你有恋人吗？
lyrics.romanization: Hey you ko i bi to wa?

lyrics.lyric: 出会いとかはどう？始まった
lyrics.translation: 邂逅如何？由此开始交谈
lyrics.romanization: de a i to ka wa do u?ha ji ma tta

lyrics.lyric: Bad day (Bad things)
lyrics.translation: 倒霉的一日 糟糕的诸事 我的上司
lyrics.romanization: Bad day (Bad things)

lyrics.lyric: My boss (Oh-oh)
lyrics.translation: Oh, oh...
lyrics.romanization: My boss (Oh-oh)

lyrics.lyric: 嫌いなの 話しかけないで
lyrics.translation: 不要附加上讨厌的话题
lyrics.romanization: ki ra i na no ha na shi ka ke na i de

lyrics.lyric: 不愉快なお節介で決まった 憂鬱な約束
lyrics.translation: 因那悲伤的多管闲事而定下这郁闷的约定
lyrics.romanization: fu yu ka i na o se kka i de ki ma tta yu u u tsu na ya ku so ku

lyrics.lyric: そんな一日が始まる
lyrics.translation: 而后这样的一日拉开了帷幕
lyrics.romanization: so n na tsu i ta chi ga ha ji ma ru

lyrics.lyric: 待ち合わせは朝の station
lyrics.translation: 约会地点在清晨的站台
lyrics.romanization: ma chi a wa se wa a sa no station

lyrics.lyric: いつもよりも着飾る but not special
lyrics.translation: 但并非特别 穿着却胜过平素
lyrics.romanization: i tsu mo yo ri mo ki ka za ru but not special

lyrics.lyric: 浮き足立つ私の
lyrics.translation: 内心飘飘然的我
lyrics.romanization: u ki a shi ta tsu wa ta shi no

lyrics.lyric: 名前を呼ぶその声に 顔上げた
lyrics.translation: 听到你呼唤我的名字 而抬起头
lyrics.romanization: na ma e wo yo bu so no ko e ni ka o a ge ta

lyrics.lyric: I've met the unknown
lyrics.translation: 我邂逅了未知
lyrics.romanization: I've met the unknown

lyrics.lyric: I don't know what you mean at all
lyrics.translation: 我不知你于众人之中何处
lyrics.romanization: I don't know what you mean at all

annotation.original: I don't know what you mean at all

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I've met the unknown
lyrics.translation: 噢 我寻找到了那未知
lyrics.romanization: Oh, I've met the unknown

lyrics.lyric: 長い前髪の
lyrics.translation: 是那留着长长刘海的
lyrics.romanization: na ga i ma e ga mi no

lyrics.lyric: I've met the unknown
lyrics.translation: 我已与未知邂逅
lyrics.romanization: I've met the unknown

lyrics.lyric: I've met him, he's mysterious
lyrics.translation: 我邂逅了 神秘莫测的他
lyrics.romanization: I've met him, he's mysterious

lyrics.lyric: まさかの出会いから始まる物語
lyrics.translation: 从邂逅开始的故事
lyrics.romanization: ma sa ka no de a i ka ra ha ji ma ru mo no ga ta ri

lyrics.lyric: 初めましてを交わしてから
lyrics.translation: 在互道初次相见之后
lyrics.romanization: ha ji me ma shi te wo ka wa shi te ka ra

lyrics.lyric: あっという間に今
lyrics.translation: 转瞬间直至当下
lyrics.romanization: a tto i u ma ni i ma

lyrics.lyric: 風切り駆け出した
lyrics.translation: 如风般奔跑着
lyrics.romanization: ka za ki ri ka ke da shi ta

lyrics.lyric: ありきたりな日々を背に二人
lyrics.translation: 我们两人背对着那些平凡
lyrics.romanization: a ri ki ta ri na hi bi wo se ni fu ta ri

lyrics.lyric: 街を抜ける
lyrics.translation: 穿梭过城市
lyrics.romanization: ma chi wo nu ke ru

lyrics.lyric: そう I've met the unknown
lyrics.translation: 没错 我邂逅了未知
lyrics.romanization: so u I've met the unknown

lyrics.lyric: I don't know what you mean at all
lyrics.translation: 我不知你于众人之中何处
lyrics.romanization: I don't know what you mean at all

annotation.original: I don't know what you mean at all

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I've met the unknown
lyrics.translation: 噢 我寻找到了那未知
lyrics.romanization: Oh, I've met the unknown

lyrics.lyric: ダボついたシャツの
lyrics.translation: 穿着宽松衬衫的
lyrics.romanization: da bo tsu i ta sha tsu no

lyrics.lyric: I've met the unknown
lyrics.translation: 我已与未知邂逅
lyrics.romanization: I've met the unknown

lyrics.lyric: Don't know what path I'd call my own
lyrics.translation: 却不知何路应该属于我
lyrics.romanization: Don't know what path I'd call my own

annotation.original: Don't know what path I'd call my own

lyrics.lyric: ありえない展開 でも
lyrics.translation: 即便这是不可能的发展
lyrics.romanization: a ri e na i te n ka i de mo

lyrics.lyric: あなたがくれた 驚きに満ちた
lyrics.translation: 满是你赐予我的惊喜
lyrics.romanization: a na ta ga ku re ta o do ro ki ni mi chi ta

lyrics.lyric: 慌ただしい今日が 気付かせてくれた
lyrics.translation: 忙碌的今日让我意识到
lyrics.romanization: a wa ta da shi i kyo u ga ki zu ka se te ku re ta

lyrics.lyric: 私がずっと 本当に嫌いだったのはきっと
lyrics.translation: 我一直以来真正厌恶的
lyrics.romanization: wa ta shi ga zu tto ho n to u ni ki ra i da tta no wa ki tto

lyrics.lyric: 私自身だった
lyrics.translation: 就是我自己啊
lyrics.romanization: wa ta shi ji shi n da tta

lyrics.lyric: 新しい毎日に take off
lyrics.translation: 在崭新的每日腾飞
lyrics.romanization: a ta ra shi i ma i ni chi ni take off

lyrics.lyric: いつもの私ごと 全部壊して oh, oh
lyrics.translation: 将过去的我全然摧毁 oh， oh
lyrics.romanization: i tsu mo no wa ta shi go to ze n bu ko wa shi te oh, oh

lyrics.lyric: どんな明日が来ようと
lyrics.translation: 无论明天如何
lyrics.romanization: do n na a shi ta ga ko yo u to

lyrics.lyric: 私は私を生きると そう決めたの
lyrics.translation: 我决意活出真实的自我
lyrics.romanization: wa ta shi wa wa ta shi wo i ki ru to so u ki me ta no

lyrics.lyric: I've met the unknown
lyrics.translation: 我邂逅了未知
lyrics.romanization: I've met the unknown

lyrics.lyric: Unlocking doors all of my own
lyrics.translation: 开启了属于我的所有门扉
lyrics.romanization: Unlocking doors all of my own

annotation.original: Unlocking doors all of my own

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I'll meet new unknowns
lyrics.translation: 噢 我将邂逅新的未知
lyrics.romanization: Oh, I'll meet new unknowns

lyrics.lyric: お決まりの今日を 退屈な日々を
lyrics.translation: 一如往常的今日 依旧如此索然无味
lyrics.romanization: o ki ma ri no kyo u wo ta i ku tsu na hi bi wo

lyrics.lyric: 変えるのは今日だ
lyrics.translation: 改变就在当下
lyrics.romanization: ka e ru no wa kyo u da

lyrics.lyric: 振り返らないで
lyrics.translation: 请勿蓦然回首
lyrics.romanization: fu ri ka e ra na i de

lyrics.lyric: ここから始まる
lyrics.translation: 从这里开始的
lyrics.romanization: ko ko ka ra ha ji ma ru

lyrics.lyric: 私の物語
lyrics.translation: 是属于我的故事
lyrics.romanization: wa ta shi no mo no ga ta ri
